# ManningResistance { #ribasim.ManningResistance }

`ManningResistance(self, static)`

Flow through this connection is estimated by conservation of energy and the
Manning-Gauckler formula to estimate friction losses.

## Parameters

| Name     | Type         | Description                                 | Default   |
|----------|--------------|---------------------------------------------|-----------|
| `static` | pd.DataFrame | Table with the constant Manning parameters. | required  |
